newsitem.title: PAKISTAN: Pakistan to auction six-month bonds.
newsitem.headline: Pakistan to auction six-month bonds.

text.p: The State (central) Bank of Pakistan said on Sunday it had invited bids up to Tuesday for the auction of six-month maturity short-term federal bonds.
The auction results will be announced on Wednesday with settlement set for Thursday, it said.
It said a pre-auction target had been set at 9.526 billion rupees, but bids could be rejected without giving any reason.
In the previous auction on November 5, bids worth 5.544 billion rupees were accepted at a weighted average yield of 15.3594 percent per annum, against a target of 12 billion rupees.
